name: Bedwyr
description:
Bedwyr is an upcoming third-person action-adventure game. Take on the journey across the rugged islands of Bedwyr with Melina and Albus,  abducted by a band of rebels and hunted by their own kind. Will they be able to stay alive and get to the truth of Bedwyr's power struggle?

A prototype to test out the core mechanics of Bedwyr has been uploaded. We'll keep updating the page with additional game assets until the actual release.
